Executive Assistant Job at Unicorn Innovations Hill Limited




        
    

        
        Unicorn Innovations Hill Limited is aforward-thinking human resource consultancy firm dedicated to empowering organizations with smart, scalable, and people-centric HR solutions. We specialize in talent acquisition, recruitment process outsourcing (RPO), organizational development, and HR advisory services across various industries. We connect businesses with top-tier professionals by combining deep market insights, cutting-edge recruitment technology, and a personalized approach to workforce strategy.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant
Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Daily touch base meetings.
	Act as the point of contact among executives, employees, clients, and other external partners.
	Manage the director’s social media pages and coaching platforms.
	Support with coordination of the Coaching App.
	Manage managing director’s calendars and set up meetings.
	Make travel and accommodation arrangements.
	Preparation of presentations and write-ups.
	Writing clear, compelling copy for various mediums (e.g., ads, blog posts, coaching platforms, newsletters).
	Take note and support the Managing Director’s virtual coaching sessions or meetings.
	Collaborate with and support the business units as required.
	Format information for internal and external communication (memos, emails, presentations, reports).
	Research as required.
	Screen and direct phone calls and distribute correspondence.


Job Specifications Functional Competencies / Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with experience.
	Excellent reporting and presentation skills.
	Ability to effectively utilise Microsoft Office packages and other equivalents.
	Knowledge of online content strategy and creation.
	Outstanding organisational, time management, and Copywriting skills.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Application to: timiashade@unicorninnovationshill.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note
The social media platforms include: a. LinkedIn b. Facebook c. Instagram d. Twitter.
The coaching platforms include: a. Coach Hub b. Better Up c. FORBES d. ICF Knowledge Platform.

Shift Manager Job at Skyline International Tourism & Hospitality Limited




        
    

        
        Skyline International Tourism and Hospitality (SITH) Limited was established in 2019 as the hospitality division of the Skyline Group in Nigeria. SITH is the franchisee for Pizza Hut in Nigeria (all regions except Lagos). Pizza Hut is part of Yum Brands (formerly PepsiCo Restaurants). Skyline International Tourism and Hospitality is the fastest growing F&B company in Nigeria. StrEat Café is a brand curated by the team at Skyline International Tourism & Hospitality Ltd. StrEat café is an amalgamation of food and beverages from various parts of the world, served in a charming and relaxed ambience.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




To top it off, we have carefully crafted Mövenpick Ice Cream with the Alpine Spirit. The way we take care of our cows Matilda, Sophie and Candy, the one that inspires us to passionately pick the right natural ingredients to craft every Mövenpick Ice Cream. Skyline International Tourism and Hospitality Ltd (SITH) was established in 2019 as the hospitality division of the Skyline Group in Nigeria. SITH is the franchisee for Pizza Hut in Nigeria (all regions except Lagos). Pizza Hut is part of Yum Brands (formerly PepsiCo Restaurants). Skyline International Tourism and Hospitality is the fastest growing F&B company in Nigeria. StrEat Café is a brand curated by the team at Skyline International Tourism & Hospitality Ltd. StrEat café is an amalgamation of food and beverages from various parts of the world, served in a charming and relaxed ambience. To top it off, we have carefully crafted Mövenpick Ice Cream with the Alpine Spirit. The way we take care of our cows Matilda, Sophie and Candy, the one that inspires us to passionately pick the right natural ingredients to craft every Mövenpick Ice Cream.



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Shift Manager

Job Location: Lugbe, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time



Key Responsibilities


	Staff Supervision: Delegate tasks, assign roles, monitor performance, train, and motivate staff.
	Customer Service: Ensure high-quality service, handle complaints, and resolve guest issues effectively.
	Operations Management: Oversee daily activities, ensure adherence to policies, manage reservations, and handle opening/closing procedures.
	Inventory & Quality Control: Monitor stock, place orders, ensure food quality, and maintain health/safety standards.
	Administrative Duties: Prepare shift reports, manage cash handling, and reconcile registers.


Essential Skills & Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess an HND qualification with 1-4 years experience.
	Leadership: Ability to motivate, delegate, and build a strong team.
	Communication: Strong verbal and written skills for staff and customers.
	Problem-Solving: Quick and effective resolution of challenges.
	Experience: Prior supervisory experience in food service is usually required.
	Knowledge: Understanding of food safety, company policies, and basic computer skills.
	Physical Ability: Capable of standing for long periods and lifting items.
	Must reside in Lugbe




Salary
N90,000 - N100,000 / Month.



Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: hrd@sithltd.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
